clause_text: 1. Definitions This clause defines important terms used in the agreement.

1.1 Scope This clause
explains the scope of the contract and its limitations.

2. Payment Terms The buyer agrees to pay
the seller within 30 days of invoice receipt.

3. Confidentiality Both parties agree not to disclose
confidential information.

4. Termination Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days'
notice.
